title: Riot have a new punishment system!
body:
Oh, wow, the sneaky devils.

If you're toxic in game and stuff, the first thing they do is place you on teams with people who consistently get under 1.0 KDA.

Holy crap, that is unethical!

replies.body:
While I appreciate the frustration, there's clearly a bit of negativity bias going on. Saying you keep getting teams with <1 KDA is misleading and just not true, look through your history.

From what I can tell, your struggle likely stems from the fact that you've plateaued. You've hit your 50% winrate, so without significant improvement (which happens over time) you aren't going to climb any higher.

Sometimes you do just get bad teammates, but you also have to consider that oftentimes the loss causes the bad KDA, rather than the other way around. If your team is losing laning phase because the enemy team is just better, of course KDAs are going to be low. Since you're most likely at your correct rank, half the time the enemy team is just going to be better.
Got any proof? Because making claims like that without any proof is pretty unethical.
